name: Bitraid
description:
Bitraid is a top-down zombie survival game, made with Gamemaker Studio 2. Bitraid has you surviving through a maximum of 50 waves, to get money and try to compete on the leaderboard.
The game has over 100 custom weapon skins, that you can buy/sell and unlock from crates. Currently the game only has 6 characters, but more are already planned to be added for the next update.

The game took me two months to make on my own, and is the second full game I have ever made. It's a huge improvement from my last attempt, with way less bugs, and way more content.
You can help me improve the game, by downloading the game, playing it for a while, and pressing F12 in the game to open up a form with questions to answer. The answers I get to these questions will help me balance the game, fix bugs and add new features.

I would like to give a massive thank you to my community, for supporting the project. I hope you enjoy the game.
